textSub.name: tagline
textSub.string: Sometimes you need a little boost!

textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: The quick moving schools of Angel Fish are hard to catch.\n Use the Speed Boost bubbles to catch them before they\n can get away.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
NEW POWER-UP!
 Chow down a Speed Boost bubble for some serious
 speed. The boost indicator will flash as the effect
 start to wear off.
